In black and white: the 2021 Mono photography awards – in pictures

Dedicated to the art of monochrome and black-and-white photography in Australia and New Zealand, the Mono awards has announced its winners across three categories: people, places and animals

Main image: This photograph, titled Hope, placed fifth in the ‘people’ category of the 2021 Mono photography awards. Photograph: Reza Bagheri/The Mono awards

  • Mel Sinclair: Pick up sticks

    First place: places

  • Daniel Towns: Shepherd on the shoreline

    Fourth place: animals

  • David Cossini: A study for Vimel

    Fourth place: people

  • Wayne Riley: Bullseye

    Fifth place: places

  • Susan Sventek: Penitent

    First place: people

  • Diana Fernie: Just chill

    First place: animals

  • Tebani Slade: Winter playground

    Second place: places

  • Andrew Dickman: Go lassie, go

    Third place: animals

  • Karen Waller: Scott

    Third place: people

  • Diana Fernie : Different

    Fifth place: animals
